entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:29 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -38.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 07:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -38.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -42.0°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 34.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
